problem_names: lemma Grp_apply: "Grp A f x y \<longleftrightarrow> y = f x \<and> x \<in> A"
lemma conversep_Grp_id: "(Grp A id)\<inverse>\<inverse> = Grp A id"
lemma eq_onp_compp_Grp: "eq_onp P OO Grp A f = Grp (Collect P \<inter> A) f"
lemmas relcompp_witness[of _ _ "(x, y)" for x y, simplified] = relcompp_witness1 relcompp_witness2
lemma Quotient_equiv_abs1: "\<lbrakk> Quotient R Abs Rep T; R x y \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> T x (Abs y)"
lemma Quotient_equiv_abs2: "\<lbrakk> Quotient R Abs Rep T; R x y \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> T y (Abs x)"
lemma Quotient_rep_equiv1: "\<lbrakk> Quotient R Abs Rep T; T a b \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> R a (Rep b)"
lemma Quotient_rep_equiv2: "\<lbrakk> Quotient R Abs Rep T; T a b \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> R (Rep b) a"
translations: lemma Domainp_conversep: "Domainp R\<inverse>\<inverse> = Rangep R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Domainp R\<inverse>\<inverse> = Rangep R
by auto
lemma Grp_apply: "Grp A f x y \<longleftrightarrow> y = f x \<and> x \<in> A"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Grp A f x y = (y = f x \<and> x \<in> A)
by (simp add: Grp_def)
lemma conversep_Grp_id: "(Grp A id)\<inverse>\<inverse> = Grp A id"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (Grp A id)\<inverse>\<inverse> = Grp A id
by (auto simp add: fun_eq_iff Grp_apply)
lemma eq_onp_compp_Grp: "eq_onp P OO Grp A f = Grp (Collect P \<inter> A) f"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. eq_onp P OO Grp A f = Grp (Collect P \<inter> A) f
by (auto simp add: fun_eq_iff eq_onp_def elim: GrpE intro: GrpI)
consts relcompp_witness :: "('a \<Rightarrow> 'b \<Rightarrow> bool) \<Rightarrow> ('b \<Rightarrow> 'c \<Rightarrow> bool) \<Rightarrow> 'a \<times> 'c \<Rightarrow> 'b"

specification (relcompp_witness)
  relcompp_witness1: "(A OO B) (fst xy) (snd xy) \<Longrightarrow> A (fst xy) (relcompp_witness A B xy)"
  relcompp_witness2: "(A OO B) (fst xy) (snd xy) \<Longrightarrow> B (relcompp_witness A B xy) (snd xy)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>relcompp_witness.
       (\<forall>A B xy.
           (A OO B) (fst xy) (snd xy) \<longrightarrow>
           A (fst xy) (relcompp_witness A B xy)) \<and>
       (\<forall>A B xy.
           (A OO B) (fst xy) (snd xy) \<longrightarrow>
           B (relcompp_witness A B xy) (snd xy))
apply(fold all_conj_distrib)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>relcompp_witness.
       \<forall>x xa xb.
          ((x OO xa) (fst xb) (snd xb) \<longrightarrow>
           x (fst xb) (relcompp_witness x xa xb)) \<and>
          ((x OO xa) (fst xb) (snd xb) \<longrightarrow>
           xa (relcompp_witness x xa xb) (snd xb))
apply(rule choice allI)+

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>x xa xb.
       \<exists>y.
          ((x OO xa) (fst xb) (snd xb) \<longrightarrow>
           x (fst xb) y) \<and>
          ((x OO xa) (fst xb) (snd xb) \<longrightarrow> xa y (snd xb))
apply(auto)

proof (prove)
goal:
No subgoals!
done
lemmas relcompp_witness[of _ _ "(x, y)" for x y, simplified] = relcompp_witness1 relcompp_witness2
hide_fact (open) relcompp_witness1 relcompp_witness2
lemma relcompp_witness_eq [simp]: "relcompp_witness (=) (=) (x, x) = x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. relcompp_witness (=) (=) (x, x) = x
using relcompp_witness(1)[of "(=)" "(=)" x x]

proof (prove)
using this:
  ((=) OO (=)) x x \<Longrightarrow> x = relcompp_witness (=) (=) (x, x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. relcompp_witness (=) (=) (x, x) = x
by (simp add: eq_OO)
lemma Quotient_equiv_abs1: "\<lbrakk> Quotient R Abs Rep T; R x y \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> T x (Abs y)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>Quotient R Abs Rep T; R x y\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> T x (Abs y)
unfolding Quotient_alt_def2

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(\<forall>a b. T a b \<longrightarrow> Abs a = b) \<and>
             (\<forall>b. T (Rep b) b) \<and>
             (\<forall>x y. R x y = (T x (Abs y) \<and> T y (Abs x)));
     R x y\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> T x (Abs y)
by blast
lemma Quotient_equiv_abs2: "\<lbrakk> Quotient R Abs Rep T; R x y \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> T y (Abs x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>Quotient R Abs Rep T; R x y\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> T y (Abs x)
unfolding Quotient_alt_def2

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(\<forall>a b. T a b \<longrightarrow> Abs a = b) \<and>
             (\<forall>b. T (Rep b) b) \<and>
             (\<forall>x y. R x y = (T x (Abs y) \<and> T y (Abs x)));
     R x y\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> T y (Abs x)
by blast
lemma Quotient_rep_equiv1: "\<lbrakk> Quotient R Abs Rep T; T a b \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> R a (Rep b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>Quotient R Abs Rep T; T a b\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> R a (Rep b)
unfolding Quotient_alt_def3

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(\<forall>a b. T a b \<longrightarrow> Abs a = b) \<and>
             (\<forall>b. T (Rep b) b) \<and>
             (\<forall>x y. R x y = (\<exists>z. T x z \<and> T y z));
     T a b\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> R a (Rep b)
by blast
lemma Quotient_rep_equiv2: "\<lbrakk> Quotient R Abs Rep T; T a b \<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> R (Rep b) a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>Quotient R Abs Rep T; T a b\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> R (Rep b) a
unfolding Quotient_alt_def3

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>(\<forall>a b. T a b \<longrightarrow> Abs a = b) \<and>
             (\<forall>b. T (Rep b) b) \<and>
             (\<forall>x y. R x y = (\<exists>z. T x z \<and> T y z));
     T a b\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> R (Rep b) a
by blast
end
